> "The backup is on the way" say dryly Hydras

Even as Hydras' voice came over the speakers, the large form of
Scorponok could be seen. At the moment he was a barely discernible
dot, but he was quickly growing larger and more distinct. First the
size of his frame, the deep purples and green of his armor, then shape
of his clawed hands comes finally into view as he moved quickly closer
to the faux battle that was taking place!

"Don't worry" Scorponok's voice cut in on the transmission, sounding
almost condescending, "I am almost there."

(TAG)

Preston
